summary.para: A DownloadHandler subclass specialized for downloading audio data for use as AudioClip objects.
Returns the downloaded AudioClip, or null. (Read Only)
Create AudioClip that is compressed in memory.

summary.para: Constructor, specifies what kind of audio data is going to be downloaded.

member.param: The nominal (pre-redirect) URL at which the audio clip is located.
Value to set for AudioClip type.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.Networking.DownloadHandlerAudioClip.GetContent(UnityEngine.Networking.UnityWebRequest)

summary.para: Returns the downloaded AudioClip, or null.

member.param: A finished UnityWebRequest object with DownloadHandlerAudioClip attached.

summary.para: Called by DownloadHandler.data. Returns a copy of the downloaded clip data as raw bytes.

returns.para: A copy of the downloaded data.

Helpers for downloading multimedia files using UnityWebRequest.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.Networking.UnityWebRequestMultimedia.GetAudioClip(System.String,UnityEngine.AudioType)

summary.para: Create a UnityWebRequest to download an audio clip via HTTP GET and create an AudioClip based on the retrieved data.

member.param: The URI of the audio clip to download.
The type of audio encoding for the downloaded audio clip. See AudioType.

returns.para: A UnityWebRequest properly configured to download an audio clip and convert it to an AudioClip.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.Networking.UnityWebRequestMultimedia.GetMovieTexture(System.String)

summary.para: Create a UnityWebRequest intended to download a movie clip via HTTP GET and create an MovieTexture based on the retrieved data.

member.param: The URI of the movie clip to download.

returns.para: A UnityWebRequest properly configured to download a movie clip and convert it to a MovieTexture.

summary.para: The UnityWebRequestAudio module provides the DownloadHandlerAudioClip class to use UnityWebRequest to download AudioClips.
